og.description: Pope Francis on Tuesday harshly criticized "trickle-down" economics and an unfettered free market, saying a socioeconomic system that leaves the poor with no means to support themselves is a grave sin.
og.title: Pope Francis Rips 'Trickle-Down' Economics
